statements: SELECT * FROM bioreactor_monitoring;
SELECT bioreactor_id, temperature, pH FROM bioreactor_monitoring WHERE oxygen_level > 20;
SELECT enzyme_production, agitation_speed FROM bioreactor_monitoring WHERE temperature < 30;
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_monitoring ORDER BY pH DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(oxygen_level), MIN(agitation_speed) FROM bioreactor_monitoring;
SELECT temperature, pH, oxygen_level FROM bioreactor_monitoring WHERE bioreactor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_monitoring ORDER BY agitation_speed DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(pH), MIN(oxygen_level) FROM bioreactor_monitoring;
SELECT bioreactor_id, temperature AS temp, pH AS acidity FROM bioreactor_monitoring WHERE enzyme_production = TRUE;
SELECT bioreactor_id, pH FROM bioreactor_monitoring WHERE temperature > 30 AND enzyme_production = FALSE ORDER BY pH DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bioreactor;
SELECT bioreactor_name, temperature FROM Bioreactor WHERE pressure > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT bioreactor_id, bioreactor_name FROM Bioreactor ORDER BY bioreactor_id DESC;
SELECT bioreactor_id, bioreactor_name, pressure FROM Bioreactor WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, MAX(pressure) AS max_pressure FROM Bioreactor;
SELECT * FROM Bioreactor WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY pressure DESC;
SELECT bioreactor_name, temperature FROM Bioreactor WHERE pressure < 50;
SELECT bioreactor_id, bioreactor_name FROM Bioreactor WHERE pressure > 100 AND temperature < 40;
SELECT * FROM EnzymeProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY enzyme_yield DESC;
SELECT enzyme_name, enzyme_yield FROM EnzymeProduction WHERE enzyme_yield > 0.8 ORDER BY enzyme_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioreactors;
SELECT reactor_name, temperature, ph_level FROM bioreactors ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT volume, reactor_name FROM bioreactors WHERE ph_level < 7.0;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_logs WHERE glucose_concentration > 10.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT bioreactor_id, enzyme_type, enzyme_yield FROM enzyme_production WHERE enzyme_yield > 0.5;
SELECT id, reactor_name, temperature, ph_level FROM bioreactors;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_logs WHERE glucose_concentration > 10.0 AND ethanol_concentration < 5.0;
SELECT production_id, bioreactor_id, enzyme_type, enzyme_yield FROM enzyme_production ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioreactors WHERE volume >= 100 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT bioreactor_id, AVG(enzyme_yield) AS avg_yield FROM enzyme_production GROUP BY bioreactor_id HAVING avg_yield > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Bioreactor_monitoring;
SELECT id, temperature FROM Bioreactor_monitoring WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT enzyme_name, production_date FROM Enzyme_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT fermentation_type, start_date, end_date FROM Fermentation WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT system_name, status FROM Control_system WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Bioreactor_monitoring WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT enzyme_name, quantity FROM Enzyme_production ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, fermentation_type, start_date FROM Fermentation WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, system_name, status FROM Control_system WHERE status = TRUE AND mode = 'Automatic'
SELECT max(temperature) AS max_temp, min(pressure) AS min_pressure FROM Bioreactor_monitoring
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE bioreactor_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, agitation_speed FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE pressure > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_settings ORDER BY agitation_speed DESC;
SELECT bioreactor_id, temperature FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE agitation_speed BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT bioreactor_id, temperature, pressure, agitation_speed FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY bioreactor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE pressure < 10 ORDER BY agitation_speed ASC
SELECT bioreactor_id, temperature FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE agitation_speed BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM bioreactor_settings
SELECT bioreactor_id, pressure FROM bioreactor_settings WHERE temperature < 30 ORDER BY pressure
